class.name: BTRepeatUntilSuccess
class.brief_description: BT decorator that repeats child until [code]SUCCESS[/code].
class.description: BT decorator that repeats the child until [code]SUCCESS[/code] status is returned. Returns [code]RUNNING[/code] when the child returns [code]RUNNING[/code] or [code]FAILURE[/code]. Returns [code]SUCCESS[/code] when the child returns [code]SUCCESS[/code].
